plot: While flying across the country en route to a film shoot in Rome, movie star Barbara "Bunny" Blake receives a gift from her hometown fans in Howardville: a ring which is giving her warnings to come home.

Actress Bunny Blake receives an invitation from her sister, to return home. She arrives on the same day as the town's annual picnic, and feels a sense of dread. She doesn't get much cooperation and takes matters into her own hands.—garykmcd

In Los Angeles, the spoiled famous actress Barbara "Bunny" Blake is ready to travel to Rome with her agent and friend Cici to shoot her next movie. She receives a ring from her friends from her hometown Howardsville and she sees some of them trying to communicate with her. Out of the blue, she arrives at her sister's house in Howardsville and she tells to her sister Hildy and her nephew Bud Powell that she will spend the day with them. However, she learns that Hildy is organizing the annual picnic of the day of the founder, and she tries to demote them to go. Then she broadcast on the TV that she will give a lecture in the high-school and makes people give-up to go to the picnic. Hildy believes her sister is jealous but something mysterious happens.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
